sentence: and moved to aid her primary opponent, Harriet Hageman, who is former president Donald Trump's preferred candidate for Wyoming's lone congressional seat.
title: GOP claims 1/6 "legitimate political discourse" because truth is fiction and patriots are turncoats

sentence: Her main challenger in this race, Harriet Hageman, went in the opposite direction: from fervent Never Trumper in 2016 to a fervent Trumper today.
title: It's Never a Good Time for the Hunter Biden Story
